title: Occupants approach Pokrovsk, authorities ask residents to evacuate | УНН
text: Occupants approach Pokrovsk, authorities ask residents to evacuate Kyiv • UNN Russian troops have approached Pokrovsk to within 10 km. The authorities are urging residents to evacuate immediately, providing contact numbers to organize their departure. Russian troops continue to approach Pokrovsk, Donetsk region, and are approximately 10 km from the city. Residents need to evacuate as soon as possible. This was reported by the head of the Pokrovsk MVA Sergey Dobryak, UNN reports . Details Dobriak emphasized that the occupiers are cynically shelling not only critical infrastructure facilities but also residential buildings. The evacuation is currently underway in the city, and residents should not delay it, he emphasized. The enemy is rapidly approaching the outskirts of Pokrovsk. Evacuation in the community continues. Do not hesitate! Anyone who wants to evacuate is asked to call 0-800-408-911. - contact center of Pokrovska MBA: 0800300101; - Volunteers of the Vostok SOS Charitable Foundation: evacuation with children, seriously ill and disabled people with accommodation, and pets: 0800332614 from Monday to Saturday from 08.00 to 18.00; - volunteers of the NGO “Proliska” to accompany seriously ill patients with medical staff: 0932022232 and 0964041034.
